channel.title: Spell Description Changing
channel.description:
Hello-
I was wondering if somebody would tell/show how to change what it says under a spell name? For example when you hover your mouse over Varrock teleport in your spellbook menu it looks like this in the black box under all of the spell icons:
Level 25: Varrock Teleport Teleports you to Varrock
(Here they show the runes required)
I would like to change where it says "Teleports you to Varrock". I know that somebody posted a TUT that showed how to do this once before but I lost it and I've tried searching for it but as you can plainly see I couldn't find it anywhere. Help would be appreciated! [br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 08:23:06 PM[/size][hr]C'mon can't anybody help me? I'm the only one on here who hasn't had anybody help me...

item.title: Spell Description Changing
item.dc:creator: @aydem22 aydem22
item.description:
@aydem22 wrote:

I am not 100% sure, but you can try this:

search for

CheckBar();

under that, where it says

sendFrame126("Wind Spell Or Whatever", 1200);

at least it should say something close to that, but change

("Wind Spell Or Whatever")

to what you want the spell to be called, (THIS IS THE FIRST SPELL)
then, right under that it should say

sendFrame126("Requires (#) Magic", 1201);

just change

"Requires (#) Magic"

to whatever you want it to say.
(i.e.) Teleports you to Varrock
Now to change what it DOES, someone is going
to have to edit my post because i do NOT know
how to do that. (It was already on mine)

So, if I did this correctly, you now know how to change what it says, but someone else will have to tell you how to change what it does.

Read full topic

item.title: Spell Description Changing
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

That will NOT work. You do need to send a packet to edit the text of the interface, but I’m not sure what the packet is. Plus, you would need the ID of that part of the interface.

Read full topic

item.title: Spell Description Changing
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

ok

go to client.java

search for varrock teleport

and it should show up a screen that says

sendQuest(“Varrock Teleport”, 13037); or something like that [im using devolution so i dont have varrock teleport]

then under it

it says Teleports you to Varrock

just change that do anything you’d like

=]

Read full topic
